Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor Argentina to win based on their current form and status as the reigning Copa America and World Cup champions.
Lionel Messi will lead Argentina, with the notable absence of Paulo Dybala.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada will make their debut in the Copa America tournament.
Others: Argentina's squad features three league winners: Julian Alvarez, Lautaro Martinez, and Exequiel Palacios, who won the top divisions in England, Italy, and Germany, respectively.
Canada announced its new head coach, former Leeds and RB Leipzig manager Jesse Marsch.
